name: 9 Gems
description:
Explore a small cove littered with golden gems. You have none at first, but you must find them ALL!

Created in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 45 game jam using the theme "Start with Nothing".

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

I ran out of time for sound effects or an ending. Use your imagination!

UPDATE 19-10-09: Fixed the game consuming CPU in some browsers (now using PNG instead of SVG for the graphics, there should be no visible difference)
